players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie was found dead last night. We need to share what we saw and vote together. Who has information or suspicions? I noticed nothing unusual—what about Alice and Diana?"
You: "That's terrible about Charlie. I had no idea—I was asleep and woke up to the news. Bob, do you remember if Charlie said anything suspicious yesterday? Diana, what did you notice?"
Diana: "Bob, Alice's story sounds rehearsed. Charlie was killed last night — I investigated Alice and found they're mafia. We should vote Alice now to stop them."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found they're the mafia. We need to vote Alice now — if we wait they'll kill again tonight."

You: "I didn't expect Diana to accuse me so quickly — that seems suspicious. Diana, can you explain exactly how and when you 'investigated' me? Also, Bob, why did you immediately accept Diana's claim without asking for details?"

Bob: "Everyone — calm down. Diana, you just claimed a detective result twice but gave no details about timing or method. Alice says she was asleep; that fits normal play. We should ask Diana: who did you visit (what time/night) and what exact result language did you get? If Diana can't answer clearly, I'm leaning to not trusting her claim. Alice, do you have any alibi or anything else to add?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
